root.message: so i try to message a guy because he's online and was commenting on the topic. but there's no way to send messages. or any way to contact someone. then he went offline so now in ???? over for the night and cant do anything because of this horrid layout and privilege system. i also tryed commenting on that post but my post needs approval... what, do you have many people messing around here that you need to have all this stuff.
